通过参数`color`和`variant`实现不同预设颜色主题与形态变体的组合。.en-us: Using the parameter `color` and `variant` to combine different preset color themes and shape variants.

设置参数`disabled=True`开启禁用状态。.en-us: Set the parameter `disabled=True` to enable the disabled state.

设置参数`danger=True`开启危险状态。.en-us: Set the parameter `danger=True` to enable the danger status.

设置参数`ghost=True`开启透明背景。.en-us: Set the parameter `ghost=True` to enable the transparent background.

设置参数`shape`控制按钮形状。.en-us: Set the parameter `shape` to control the button shape.

设置参数`block=True`撑满父元素。.en-us: Set the parameter `block=True` to fill up the parent element.

设置参数`href`添加链接跳转功能。.en-us: Set the parameter `href` to add the link jump function.

设置参数`icon`添加自定义图标元素。.en-us: Set the parameter `icon` to add the custom icon element.

设置参数`autoInsertSpace`控制是否在按钮内容为两个汉字时，自动插.en-us: Set the parameter `autoInsertSpace` to control whether to insert spaces automatically when the button content is two Chinese characters.

设置参数`loading`控制是否将按钮渲染为加载中状态。.en-us: Set the parameter `loading` to control whether the button is rendered as loading status.

点击自动进入加载中状态.en-us: Click automatically enters the loading status

设置参数`autoSpin`控制按钮是否在每次被点击后自动进入加载中状态。.en-us: Set the parameter `autoSpin` to control whether the button is automatically entered into the loading status after each click.

设置参数`motionType='happy-work'`为按钮点击交互行为开启.en-us: Set the parameter `motionType='happy-work'` to enable special interaction effects when the button is clicked.

通过参数`clickExecuteJsString`为按钮设置每次点击后直接触发.en-us: Set the parameter `clickExecuteJsString` to set the javascript code that is triggered directly after each click in a simple scenario, to avoid writing callback functions.

通过`nClicks`进行按钮点击事件的监听，特别地，在有效设置参数`debou.en-us: Listen to the `nClicks` event of the button for special listeners when the parameter `debounceWait` is set, to avoid triggering too many clicks in a short time.

配合`autoSpin`、`loadingChildren`等参数优化点击按钮触.en-us: Optimize the click button to trigger the time-consuming task execution in scenarios where `autoSpin` and `loadingChildren` are used.
